poem:
### Silence in Gaza

The world quietens,  
as shadows fall over  
a land bound in pain.  
Voices, whispers, harsh  
as the desert winds,  
seek justice amidst  
a cacophony of silence.  
The children stare,  
unspeaking witnesses  
of a tragedy.  
Yet beyond walls,  
there stirs a persistent  
chord of hope,  
yearning for harmony  
in fractured echoes.
